attributes.action: Vote of 'no confidence' in David Cameron's leadership of Conservative party
attributes.background: The contempt he holds for those that do not share his views is quiet obviouse.   He is behaving like a dictator without having any respect for the views of others.  He has shown he does not understand the democratic values that this country has and has clearly made his mind up that it's his way only

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition as it is about who leads the Conservative Party. That is a matter for the Conservative Party rather than the UK Government or Parliament. 

We already have petitions calling for a vote of no confidence in him as Prime Minister:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122766
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118262
